title: SpadeAce (Java GUI)
description: Recreated the popular card game Solitaire using Java's graphical user interface. Handmade front end developement and card movement system. Able to read and write highscores into a file in order to remember even after game has ended.

title: Key Club Bot
description: Key Club bot was created as a method of communication within our school's Key Club. Its main functions were to provide club members with meeting information, minutes, and tell jokes.

title: Halo
description: Halo is a hackathon winning app aimed at recognizing, preventing and reporting sexual assault. A main functionality is the ability to anonymously report Sexual assault which sends the complaint to a linked discord server where authorities can act further.
